review_text: This vacuum really sucks....but in a GOOD way.The motor is plenty strong.  You can actually see it pick up the carpet.  Just be careful not to get anything (throw rug fringe, shoe laces, etc.) caught in it.I would give it a 5-Star rating except for the plastic handle.  It feels flimsy.  You'll probably need to replace the handle before the motor gives out.Overall, I'm glad I bought it.
